title: Buddhist compassion for sentient beings warrants enactment of Sri Lanka’s Animal Welfare Bill without any further delay
content: – by Shenali Waduge – Sri Lanka with a Theravada Buddhist civilization that protected and fostered Buddhism has much to introspect.
